reviewText: This is a must have for anyone's comedy collection! Spies Like Us is a classic. Nothing But Trouble is just so-so.

reviewText: I really enjoyed these movies when they came out in the theaters.  A great cast and cameos.  A great way to spent a night in front of the tube...
Title: N/A

reviewText: "Nothing But Trouble" really isn't bad but it isn't good either. Bought this double header DVD set because it had two films for about the price of one! I'm cheap!"Spies Like Us" is a very funny film. Chevy and Dan are terrific together. Donna Dixon (Dan's wife) is beautiful as usual and the gags are all great. Catch Chevy and Dan after their time in the centrifuge! Hilarious! The best part though is seeing Vanessa Angel come out of the tent with Dan near the end of the movie. She is unbelieveable in her bra! What a set!She was just starting out then and was young and gorgeous!Bob Hope's cameo is short but funny. Bernie Casey's salute is outstanding! The film is a little dated now but for it's time the political humor was excelent!Enjoy!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Ordered this movie because my boyfriend never saw it before.  I knew it was a classic so I wanted to buy it.  He loved it as much as I aleays have.  Great quality DVD.  No problems during playing.  Fast shipping and overall a good buying experience.  I would definitely recommend this movie to someone that likes these two actors.

reviewText: Be careful, both movies on this DVD are full screen. I should have looked more closely but I didn't know they even made full screen anymore without a widescreen option. I was glad to find both movies on one disc, but I had to return it. I just couldn't bear the thought when the real version is out there.
